title: Dawnbringer Ward?
body: Will the dawnbringer ward ever return to the shops?

replies.body: Possibly not as it is legacy content, however it may still be available via hextech crafting. If they do VS events like this in the future it is possible it will be available for purchase at that time, same as how the Christmas skins come out of the vault for every Christmas.
Ahh ok. Thanks, was kind of hoping to grab the ward when if it came out since i missed out on it during the event but i guess we'll just have to see. :)
